page.title: 09Getting About
page.content: The{transport}services in and around Tadcaster are very good, especially for the{old people}who use buses and taxis to travel in. The buses to and from Tadcaster Grammar School are very unreliable. They often do not turn up to take us home which means we have to telephone our mothers to come and fetch us in the car. Most{teenagers}from the age of sixteen have a 50cc{moped.}The most popular mopeds are Suzukis and Kawasakis. These are extremely economical on petrol as they do about 70 miles to the gallon. The cost of these mopeds brand new is about six hundred pounds.
